metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7313 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: www/resource.py in Buildbot before 1.8.1 allows CRLF injection in the Location header of /auth/login and /auth/logout via the redirect parameter. This affects other web sites in the same domain.

criterions.comment: buildbot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
